tasks.title: Initialize Go module and project structure
tasks.description: Create go.mod, directory structure, and basic files as per architecture
tasks.details: Run `go mod init github.com/argami/cclaude` with go 1.21. Create directories: cmd/cclaude, internal/config, internal/provider, internal/validator, pkg/models, pkg/cli, config. Add empty files matching the architecture diagram. Ensure zero external dependencies initially.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify directory structure matches PRD diagram, `go mod tidy` succeeds, no compilation errors on empty main.go

tasks.title: Implement provider models
tasks.description: Create pkg/models/provider.go with exact Provider struct and providers map for mimo, minimax, kimi, glm
tasks.details: Define Provider struct with Name, BaseURL, Model, EnvKey fields. Implement providers map exactly as specified: mimo (https://api.xiaomimimo.com/anthropic, mimo-v2-flash, MIMO_API_KEY), minimax (https://api.minimax.io/anthropic, MiniMax-M2.1, MINIMAX_API_KEY), add kimi and glm with placeholder values if not specified. Use exported types following Go conventions.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit test: TestProviderExists() checks all 4 providers return correct config, TestInvalidProvider() returns error

tasks.title: Implement CLI flags parsing
tasks.description: Create pkg/cli/flags.go with Flags struct and ParseFlags() using standard flag package
tasks.details: Define Flags struct: Provider, Model strings, DryRun/Verbose/Version/Help bools. Use flag.StringVar, flag.BoolVar for --provider, --model, --dry-run, --verbose, --version, --help. Support positional args after flags. Usage: flag.Usage() with clear help text.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration test: Parse various flag combinations, verify struct fields match inputs, test positional args capture

tasks.title: Implement API key validator
tasks.description: Create internal/validator/validator.go with ValidateAPIKey(provider) function
tasks.details: Lookup provider in models map, check if os.Getenv(provider.EnvKey) is non-empty. Return descriptive error like `Missing API key for %s: set %s` if missing. Use fmt.Errorf for errors.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests: TestValidateAPIKeyValid() with mocked env succeeds, TestMissingKey() returns expected error, TestInvalidProvider() returns provider not found error

tasks.title: Implement configuration loader
tasks.description: Create internal/config/config.go with Config struct and LoadConfig(path) merging YAML + env vars
tasks.details: Define Config struct matching spec: Provider, Model, Timeout_ms int, EnvOverrides map[string]string with yaml tags. Use gopkg.in/yaml.v3 for YAML parsing (add to go.mod). Load file if exists, override with env vars (e.g. CCLUADE_PROVIDER), prioritize CLI flags last. Return defaults if no config.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests: TestLoadEmptyConfig() returns defaults, TestYAMLConfig() parses file correctly, TestEnvOverride() env vars take precedence, TestFlagOverride() CLI flags final

tasks.title: Implement provider execution logic
tasks.description: Create internal/provider/provider.go with Execute(provider, args) setting env vars and exec.Command('claude')
tasks.details: Lookup provider config, set ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=provider.BaseURL, ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN=os.Getenv(provider.EnvKey), merge Config.EnvOverrides. Use exec.Command("claude", args...), pipe Stdin/Stdout/Stderr to os, return cmd.Run() error. Handle model via env if needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration test: Mock exec.Command, verify env vars set correctly, test stdin/stdout piping, test error propagation

tasks.title: Create main entry point
tasks.description: Implement cmd/cclaude/main.go orchestrating flags, config, validation, and execution
tasks.details: Parse flags, handle --help/--version (print version from LDFLAGS), load config with overrides, validate API key if provider specified, handle --dry-run (print config without exec), else Execute(). Use proper error handling and os.Exit(1) on errors. Add version const.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end test: Run main with various flag combos, verify correct execution path, mock claude binary for integration

tasks.title: Implement Makefile for build and distribution
tasks.description: Create Makefile with build, test, install, clean, release targets matching spec
tasks.details: Implement exact Makefile content: VERSION from git describe, LDFLAGS for version, build to ./cclaude, install to /usr/local/bin, test ./..., cross-compile linux/darwin amd64/arm64 for release, install-script echo instructions.
tasks.testStrategy: Manual verification: Run `make build`, `make test`, `make install`, verify binary works, check cross-compiled binaries execute

tasks.title: Add unit and integration tests
tasks.description: Create comprehensive go tests for all packages: provider, config, validator, cli, provider
tasks.details: Use testing package, table-driven tests. Test edge cases: missing keys, invalid providers, flag parsing, config merging, exec errors. Aim for 80%+ coverage. Add TestMain integration test simulating full execution.
tasks.testStrategy: Run `go test ./... -v -cover`, verify 100% pass rate, coverage report shows good coverage, integration test mocks claude successfully

tasks.title: Add documentation and config example
tasks.description: Create README.md and config/cclaude.yaml example file
tasks.details: README: Installation (make install), usage examples (`cclaude mimo`, env vars), providers list, troubleshooting API keys, build instructions. config/cclaude.yaml example with all fields populated for mimo provider.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify README renders correctly, config.yaml parses without error via LoadConfig test, usage examples match actual flags
